name: HackTool - SharpImpersonation Execution
description: Detects execution of the SharpImpersonation tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively
author: Sai Prashanth Pulisetti @pulisettis, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection_img: [{"Image|endswith": "\\SharpImpersonation.exe"}, {"OriginalFileName": "SharpImpersonation.exe"}]
selection_cli: [{"CommandLine|contains|all": [" user:", " binary:"]}, {"CommandLine|contains|all": [" user:", " shellcode:"]}, {"CommandLine|contains": [" technique:CreateProcessAsUserW", " technique:ImpersonateLoggedOnuser"]}]
